alert.note: Alert for Warren (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 4:53PM EDT until June 27 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR WEST CENTRAL WARREN...SOUTH CENTRAL MONROE AND NORTHEASTERN NORTHAMPTON COUNTIES... At 453 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Roxburg, or 8 miles north of Easton, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Easton, Bangor, Pen Argyl, Wind Gap, Belvidere, Harmony, East Bangor, Roxburg and Roseto. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
